text: Petr Šmejc (born 7 March 1978) is a Czech skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1998 Winter Olympics and the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the Czech Republic Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:People from Jilemnice
title: Petr Šmejc
